abstract: Home Depot‘s plans to sell its wholesale supply division to a group of private equity buyers is in doubt because the investment banks involved are reluctant to fund the deal, even at a lower price, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot‘s plans to sell its wholesale supply division to a group of private equity buyers is in doubt because the investment banks involved are reluctant to fund the deal, even at a lower price, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Banks Balk at Funding Home Depot Deal, Report Says
